Literature.Title: Influence of the Length and Charge on the Activity of ?-Helical Amphipathic Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Gagnon MC, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:90% Hemolysis=8 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=32 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1117(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 1104(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis DSM 2570(MIC=16µg/ml)
